objectives.hint: Defend a Sunspear from the Mordant Crescent in Kanuz Cache to acquire this relic.
objectives.name: Zaklem, the Rune of Loyalty

objectives.hint: Purchase this relic from Groffmok. 25 Gold.
objectives.name: Enormous Supply of Bird Feed

objectives.hint: Purchase this relic from Tendaji. 25 Gold.
objectives.name: Survival Supplies

objectives.hint: Acquire this relic from the last spearmarshal.
objectives.name: Spearmarshal's Plea

objectives.hint: Collect this egg from the griffon roost.
objectives.name: Warmed Mountain Griffon Egg

objectives.hint: Collect this egg from atop a pillar at Godfall Tower.

objectives.hint: Collect this egg from above a sheltered tree.

objectives.hint: Collect this egg from the nests of thieving Hawkeye Griffons.

objectives.hint: Collect this egg from a ledge below Jinx Hollow.
objectives.name: Damp Mountain Griffon Egg
